name: When Orbs Attack!
description:
NOTE : CONTROLLER REQUIRED (TWIN STICK SHOOTER)

When Orbs Attack! is a frantically paced, tough as nails bullet hell twin stick shooter inspired by the arcade classics. The only goal is to survive, the only question is how long.

Instructions:
Left Analog (Move Ship)
Right Analog (Rotate Ship)
Left Shoulder (Drop Mine when Ship is carrying one)
Right Shoulder (Shoot)

Black Holes can only be destroyed with mines. Being near a black hole will pull you towards and eventually into it.

Walls can only be destroyed with mines or the shotgun. Shooting walls with normal bullets will deflect them away from you.

Mines can be places down but you can also trigger mines by running into objects backwards when carrying one.

Enjoy! How long have you survived? Can you achieve 'god like'?
